overall.description: Make function raise KnownFailureException exception if given condition is true.

fail_condition.description: Flag to determine whether to mark the decorated test as a known failure (if True) or not (if False).

msg.description: Message to give on raising a KnownFailureException exception. Default is None.

decorator.description: Decorator, which, when applied to a function, causes KnownFailureException to be raised when fail_condition is True, and the function to be called normally otherwise.
